Package io.github.josephearl.result

Record Class Result.Failure<T>

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
io.github.josephearl.result.Result.Failure<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Result<T>
Enclosing interface:
Result<T>
public static record Result.Failure<T>(@NonNull Throwable exception) extends Record implements Result<T>
A Result representing a failure.

    recoverWith(@NonNull Function<? super Throwable,? extends Result<? extends T>> exceptionMapper)
    Returns the outcome of applying the given exceptionMapper function to the Throwable if this is a Result.Failure or this if this is a Result.Success This is like Result.flatMap(Function) but for the exception.

    • filter

      public Result.Failure<T> filter(Predicate<? super T> predicate)
      Description copied from interface: Result
      Returns this if this is a Result.Success and the value matches the given predicate or a Result.Failure otherwise. Returns a new Result.Failure encapsulating a NoSuchElementException if the value does not match the predicate, or this if this is a Result.Failure.
      Specified by:
      filter in interface Result<T>

    • mapFailure

      public Result.Failure<T> mapFailure(@NonNull @NonNull Function<? super Throwable,? extends Throwable> exceptionMapper)
      Description copied from interface: Result
      Returns a Result.Failure that encapsulates the outcome of applying the given exceptionMapper function to the Throwable if this is a Result.Failure or this if this is a Result.Success. This is like the Result.map(Function) but for the exception.
      Specified by:
      mapFailure in interface Result<T>

      public Result.Success<T> recover(@NonNull @NonNull Function<? super Throwable,? extends T> exceptionMapper)
      Description copied from interface: Result

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object).
      Specified by:
      equals in class Record
      Parameters:
      o - the object with which to compare
      Returns:
      true if this object is the same as the o argument; false otherwise.
